###  ⚠️  No Changeset found

Latest commit: 1d712b20a76aa418fd1c78a9ee75afe3fcbec71e

Merging this PR will not cause a version bump for any packages. If these changes should not result in a new version, you're good to go. **If these changes should result in a version bump, you need to add a changeset.**

<details><summary>This PR includes no changesets</summary>

  When changesets are added to this PR, you'll see the packages that this PR includes changesets for and the associated semver types

</details>

[Click here to learn what changesets are, and how to add one](https://github.com/changesets/changesets/blob/main/docs/adding-a-changeset.md).

[Click here if you're a maintainer who wants to add a changeset to this PR](https://github.com/medusajs/medusa/new/feat/introduce-helpers?filename=.changeset/thirty-lizards-end.md&value=---%0A%22%40medusajs%2Fmedusa%22%3A%20patch%0A%22%40medusajs%2Flink-modules%22%3A%20patch%0A%22integration-tests-plugins%22%3A%20patch%0A---%0A%0Achore%3A%20introduce%20helpers%20for%20integration%20tests%0A)

commits.message: prevent resolving external modules from core services immediately
always register the remoteQuery but with undefined by default
fix product variant inventory service in product isolated mode + other fixes
try removing redis_url from api tests
chore: move migration under run command

issue.title: chore(ui,icons,ui-preset,toolbox): Move design system packages to monorepo
issue.body: Moves all design system packages into the core monorepo under `/packages/design-system`.

comment.body:
#### :rocket: A snapshot release has been made for this PR

Test the snapshots by updating your `package.json` with the newly published versions:
```sh
yarn add @medusajs/admin@7.1.6-snapshot-20231027082759
```

yarn add @medusajs/admin-ui@2.1.6-snapshot-20231027082759

* fix icon colors

feat(admin-ui): add Tamil translation (#5463)

fix(medusa, modules-sdk, modules): Module loading missing dependencies + remote query reference issue (#5468)

comment.body: comment: in this test, if no expand are provided, by default the variants and prices will be part of the relations. Should we check that they are all present to prevent future issues? at least that they are all defined

pull_request.title: fix(medusa): admin get product should return prices when expected
